properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NAME , USER_NICKNAME , PHONE , EMAIL , SNS , USER_INFO , USER_AVATAR_SRC , USER_ROLE FROM USERS WHERE USER_NO = ? AND USER_ROLE IN (0, 1, 4)
SELECT * FROM PICSTORYS WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY PICSTORY_CREATEDAT DESC
SELECT PHOTO_ID , PHOTO_SRC FROM PHOTOS JOIN PICPHOTOS USING(PHOTO_ID) WHERE PICSTORY_ID = ? AND ROWNUM = 1 AND PHOTO_STATE = 0 ORDER BY PHOTO_UPDATEAT DESC
SELECT * FROM PHOTOS WHERE USER_NO = ? AND PHOTO_STATE = 0
